com.example.clock

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.clock.Timer

  • public class Timer
extends java.lang.Object
    Timer is a helper class for main activity. All class variables have getter, setter methods to update timing variables. Furthermore, this class containts two methods which update the time and return a string which represents the curren time.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Timer(int second, int minute, int hour)
      This constructor initalizes the class variables current_second, current hour, current minute.

      • Timer

        public Timer(int second,
     int minute,
     int hour)
        This constructor initalizes the class variables current_second, current hour, current minute. This constructor will be called in onCreate() of the MainActivity
        Parameters:
        second - - Represents initial seconds when the program is first called
        minute - - Represents initial minutes when the program is first called
        hour - - Represents initial hours when the pogram is first called
        Since:
        1.0

      • updateTime

        public int[] updateTime(int previous_seconds,
               int previous_minutes,
               int previous_hour)
        This method is a manual program of a clock. It takes in the previous hours, minutes, seconds and updates them accordingly
        Parameters:
        previous_seconds - - Represents the clocks current seconds
        previous_minutes - - Represents the clocks current minutes
        previous_hour - - Represents the clocks current hour
        Returns:
        int[] - This method returns the updated hours,minutes, seconds and stores them in an int arrays
        Since:
        1.0

      • display

        public java.lang.String display()
        This method calls the updateTime() method to get the current time, then returns a String with the displayed time.
        Returns:
        String - Returns the time display represented as a string
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        updateTime()
